definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: You won't find a more sensitive rod on the planet!
sentences.chinese: 在这个价位上你很难找到一款可以和他抗衡的竿子。

sentences.english: Know how deep your crankbait is running with the rod and reel setup you're using.
sentences.chinese: 通过的你竿子和轮子来感知crank下潜的深度。

sentences.english: It requires a rod with plenty of backbone.
sentences.chinese: 这就需要一根超级腰力的竿子。

sentences.english: "Pole men" would collect it in vats, carried on a pole.
sentences.chinese: “竿子工”会将其收集进缸子里，而用杆子挑着缸子。

sentences.english: When it comes to bass fishing, rods are pretty important.
sentences.chinese: 路亚鲈鱼，竿子非常重要。

sentences.english: A bamboo pole whacks me to the year 3000.
sentences.chinese: 一竿子把我支到3000年去了。

sentences.english: The way a rod "unloads" after the bait deflects can make a difference.
sentences.chinese: 这时，一把能“卸力”的竿子会大不同。

sentences.english: Sometimes you have to carry a task down to the grass-roots level, otherwise, it's better not to carry it out.
sentences.chinese: 办事有时候就要一竿子插到底，不然还不如不做。

sentences.english: This rod takes the drop-shot technique to an entirely new level.
sentences.chinese: 这款竿子可以让你的倒吊技术进入一个新的台阶。

sentences.english: Eight bamboo poles could not buffet a chip of matter.
sentences.chinese: 八竿子打不到一块的事。

sentences.english: What do these things have in common, you're asking?
sentences.chinese: 你要问了，提这些八竿子打不着的事情干什么？

sentences.english: The ocarina son sees the other gathering pull to eight bamboo poles far, is one Leng first.
sentences.chinese: 陶笛儿见对方扯到八竿子远，先是一愣。

sentences.english: Honeysuckle will entwine round the stick as it grows.
sentences.chinese: 忍冬会缠绕着竿子生长。

sentences.english: NRX 822S DSR:This rod takes the drop-shot technique to an entirely new level.
sentences.chinese: 这款竿子可以让你的倒吊技术进入一个新的台阶。

sentences.english: His silly proposals for solving the problem came out of left field.
sentences.chinese: 他解决问题的蠢提案根本是八竿子打不着一条船。

sentences.english: The higher the power rating, the heavier the lures you're able to toss;
sentences.chinese: 竿子越硬，你能抛投的饵就越重。

definition: to fish with a hook and bait
